Translations.Text: shlyakh vony plekayutʹ karavany zymy ta lita
Vony budutʹ obozhnyuvaty Lorda tse shrine
Dlya Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto fed yim pislya holodu, ta yakshcho yim z bezpekoyu pislya strakha
vy znayete kotri diysno vidmovu vira
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto mistreats syroty
Ta prykroshchi do tsykh khto zauvazhuyutʹ kontaktni molytvy (Salat)
khto ye povnistyu neuvazhnyy yikhnikh molytv
My blahoslovyly vas z bahato shchedrosti
Tomu, vy budete molytysya do vashoho Lorda (Salat), ta dayete dobrodiynistʹ
